popover.primary: A mastery path focused on longer-duration battles
A mastery path focused on dealing quick exhaustive blows
A mastery path focused on area of effect offensive abilities

data.name: Bleed Em Out
data.description: Your target suffers 500 damage over the next 10 seconds. The damage will start low, and increase as the effect continues.
data.rawDescription: Your target suffers {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} over the next {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. The damage will start low, and increase as the effect continues.

data.name: Bloodlust
data.description: All your Exhaustive Blows have a 50% chance to restore 225 hit points.
data.rawDescription: All your Exhaustive Blows have a 50% chance to restore {ABIL_3307_COM_0_VAL0} hit points.

data.name: Bring Da Pain!
data.description: Each time that you attack an enemy within the next 10 seconds, Any group member within 100 feet will have their Weapon Skill increased by 25, but your Initiative will also be reduced by 25 for the next 10 seconds. This effect can be stacked up to three times.
data.rawDescription: Each time that you attack an enemy within the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, Any group member within 100 feet will have their Weapon Skill increased by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0}, but your Initiative will also be reduced by {COM_2_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0} for the next {COM_2_VAL0_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}. This effect can be stacked up to three times.

data.name: Bring It On
data.description: You strike out at all enemies 25 feet in front of you, inflicting 169 damage every second. The damage inflicted by this ability increases by 15% for every enemy that attacked you within the previous second, to a maximum of 60%.
data.rawDescription: You strike out at all enemies {COM_1_RADI_FEET} in front of you, inflicting {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} every second. The damage inflicted by this ability increases by 15% for every enemy that attacked you within the previous second, to a maximum of 60%.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.
data.rawDescription: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Strength by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.
data.rawDescription: You bolster yourself for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Can't Stop Da Chop
data.description: You chop at your enemy, dealing 141 damage and reducing the value of incoming heals on them by 50% for the next 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You chop at your enemy, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and reducing the value of incoming heals on them by 50% for the next {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by 50% for 7 seconds.  If you use any abilities, the effect will immediately end.
data.rawDescription: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  If you use any abilities, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Chop Fasta!
data.description: Group members within 100 feet are inspired by the way you shrug off the blows, for the next 20 seconds any ability used by your groupmates will cool down 5 seconds faster.
data.rawDescription: Group members within 100 feet are inspired by the way you shrug off the blows, for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} any ability used by your groupmates will cool down 5 seconds faster.

data.name: Chop Til You Drop
data.description: Get Stuck In's cooldown timer is lowered by 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Get Stuck In's cooldown timer is lowered by 10 seconds.

data.name: Come and Git It!
data.description: Increases your Toughness by 25 for each enemy within 30 feet, up to a maximum of 9 enemies, for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Toughness by {COM_0_VAL0} for each enemy within 30 feet, up to a maximum of 9 enemies, for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Dat Tickles!
data.description: Absorbs 3600 damage for up to 20 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Absorbs {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Don't Bother Me None
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Spirit resistance by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Don't Go Nowhere
data.description: A maiming attack which deals 141 damage to the target and snares them, reducing their run speed by 40% for 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: A maiming attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to the target and snares them, reducing their run speed by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Don't Hate Da Choppa
data.description: All attacks will generate 25% less hate.
data.rawDescription: All attacks will generate {COM_0_VAL1}% less hate.

data.name: Don't Wanna Live Foreva
data.description: Increases your Strength and Weapon Skill by 120, but reduces your Toughness by 120.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Strength and Weapon Skill by {COM_0_VAL0}, but reduces your Toughness by {COM_1_VAL0}.

data.name: Drop Da Basha
data.note: Requires Target to have Parried or Blocked
data.description: Your attacks become more precise, your target's chance to block or parry is reduced by 50% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Your attacks become more precise, your target's chance to block or parry is reduced by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Easy Killin'
data.description: Reduces the Action Point costs by 5 points in Furious state and 10 points in Berserk state.
data.rawDescription: Reduces the Action Point costs by 5 points in Furious state and 10 points in Berserk state.

data.name: Extra Choppin'
data.description: Lotsa Choppin' will affect 24 targets within 30 feet and reduces the base damage by 20%.
data.rawDescription: Lotsa Choppin' will affect 24 targets within {ABIL_1747_COM_0_RADI_FEET} and reduces the base damage by 20%.

data.name: Finish 'Em Faster
data.description: Cooldowns on your Exhaustive Blows are reduced by 25%.
data.rawDescription: Cooldowns on your Exhaustive Blows are reduced by {COM_0_VAL0}%.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.
data.rawDescription: All of your attacks deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Fling Choppa
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 82 damage.
data.rawDescription: A basic throwing attack that inflicts {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You stare down your opponent, draining {COM_0_VAL0} of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by {COM_2_VAL0} for {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Furious Choppin'
data.description: A merciless strike of attacks that repeatedly hits your target for up to 5 seconds, dealing up to 194 damage. You will be healed for all damage this ability deals.
data.rawDescription: A merciless strike of attacks that repeatedly hits your target for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing up to {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE}. You will be healed for all damage this ability deals.

data.name: Git Stuck In
data.description: Your groupmates are inspired by your eagerness to fight. Auto attack speed is increased by 35% for 20 seconds for all groupmates within 100 feet.
data.rawDescription: Your groupmates are inspired by your eagerness to fight. Auto attack speed is increased by {COM_0_VAL1}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} for all groupmates within 100 feet.

data.name: Git To Da Choppa
data.description: You charge and frantically lash out at everything nearby for up to 6 seconds, dealing 138 damage every 2 seconds to all enemies within 40 feet. Each time you deal damage, you'll randomly pull one of the victims in towards you. Your speed is increased by 20% for as long as this ability is active.
data.rawDescription: You charge and frantically lash out at everything nearby for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} every 2 seconds to all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}. Each time you deal damage, you'll randomly pull one of the victims in towards you. Your speed is increased by 20% for as long as this ability is active.

data.name: Go For Da Soft Spot
data.note: Target must be facing away from you
data.description: You deal 216 damage to your enemy.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy.

data.name: Hurtin' Time
data.description: While this ability is active, your will deal an additional 100 damage whenever you strike a target with a melee attack, but you will also suffer 50 damage each time this effect occurs.
data.rawDescription: While this ability is active, your will deal an additional {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} whenever you strike a target with a melee attack, but you will also suffer {COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE} each time this effect occurs.

data.name: I'm Da Biggest!
data.description: Increases your Wounds by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Wounds by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: I'm Still Here
data.description: Increases the duration of Come An' Git It and Try An' Hurt Me by 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Increases the duration of Come An' Git It and Try An' Hurt Me by 5 seconds.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} Corporeal damage over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Keep It Comin'
data.description: When you die, you have a 25% chance of resurrecting at 25% health and unleashing a blow to all enemies within 40 feet and dealing 250 damage.
data.rawDescription: When you die, you have a 25% chance of resurrecting at 25% health and unleashing a blow to all enemies within {ABIL_3194_COM_0_RADI_FEET} and dealing {ABIL_3194_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Keep On Choppin'
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You chop deeply into your enemy, dealing 191 damage. Your love of battle fills you with energy, restoring 100 Action Points.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

You chop deeply into your enemy, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}. Your love of battle fills you with energy, restoring {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Long Lasta
data.description: Any time your Exhaustive Blow gets defended, for the next 6 seconds all attacks will cost 0 action points.
data.rawDescription: Any time your Exhaustive Blow gets defended, for the next 6 seconds all attacks will cost 0 action points.

data.name: Longer and Stronger
data.description: While you are Furious, you regain 100 health every 4 seconds. While you are Berserk, you regain 175 health every 4 seconds.
data.rawDescription: While you are Furious, you regain {COM_1_VAL0_HEALTH} every 4 seconds. While you are Berserk, you regain {COM_2_VAL0_HEALTH} every 4 seconds.

data.name: Outta My Face!
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are detaunted, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal against you to 50% for 5 seconds.  During this time, all of your attacks will cause enemies to hate you 25% less than normal. If you attack anyone you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.
